event_text: m_c was running around excitedly on patrol when {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paw landed right in a rabbit hole, twisting uncomfortably. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} limped the whole way home.
m_c couldn't help but try to show off by climbing the tallest tree {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/poss/CAP} plan backfired when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell out of the tree.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred after falling from a tall tree.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after falling from a tall tree.

event_text: m_c was practicing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} tree climbing skills when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} slipped from a branch! Thankfully {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} survived, though badly injured.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred after falling from a tree.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after falling from a tree.

event_text: m_c was hunting on a night patrol, and nearly got carried off by an owl! {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} alive, but with many a scratch as proof of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} adventure.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred after an owl tried to carry {PRONOUN/m_c/object} off.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after an owl tried to carry {PRONOUN/m_c/object} off.

event_text: r_r dares m_c to climb one of the tallest trees in the territory. m_c gets pretty high, but a branch breaks and it's a long way to the ground. r_r goes sprinting for camp to get help.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after falling from a tall tree and breaking {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} back.
